ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Mandatory Isolation), No. 2
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (MANDATORY ISOLATION), NO. 2 in order to support Canadaâ€™s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country by addressing newly emerging public health science on COVID-19 that indicates that even asymptomatic or pre-symptomatic individuals can spread the disease.
